moduleMetadataJson.name: SSH Key Persistence
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module will add an SSH key to a specified user (or all), to allow
          remote login via SSH at any time.
author: h00die <mike@shorebreaksecurity.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: USERNAME
options.description: User to add SSH key to (Default: all users on box)

options.name: PUBKEY
options.description: Public Key File to use. (Default: Create a new one)

options.name: CREATESSHFOLDER
options.description: If no .ssh folder is found, create it for a user
